channel.title: 508/525 HotZone PvP
channel.description: I am trying to make Inside Grand Exchange Non-PvP and Outside PvP. I currently copied how the Varrock PvP Area Coordinates. Can someone help me get the Grand Exchange Coordinates? Varrock HotZone Coords: [code] if ((x >= 3205 && x <= 3222 && y >= 3420 && y <= 3438) || //Varrock[/code] Someone Help me.

item.title: 508/525 HotZone PvP
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

I am trying to make Inside Grand Exchange Non-PvP and Outside PvP.
I currently copied how the Varrock PvP Area Coordinates. Can someone help me get the Grand Exchange Coordinates?
Varrock HotZone Coords:

if ((x >= 3205 && x <= 3222 && y >= 3420 && y <= 3438) || //Varrock
Someone Help me.
